name: Struck at Midnight I: The Dance of the Dead
name_original: Struck at Midnight I: The Dance of the Dead
description:
In a world plunged into eternal night, Solomon, paladin of the Order of Sol, is sent out by the King of Cronehaven on a most noble quest against the sieging forces of darkness and death that have overtaken the land. It is up to Sir Solomon to slay the commanding leaders of the undead army, destroy the four shadow orbs that perpetuate the shields around the enemy palace, and slay the Lich inside that most vile heart of darkness. All the while, he must gather strength by scouring the land for sacred seeds and divine relics and completing various side quests such as the search and rescue operation for the captured priestess of the Order of Luna, Princess Lunabelle.

Struck at Midnight I: Dance of the Dead has an average of four hours of content and the zip-file includes 37 original tracks composed in Garage Band including town themes, regional themes, dungeon themes, battle themes, and boss battle themes, all unique per area and boss fight (end credits showcase names of these tracks that correspond to their file names and where in the game they could be heard).

This game was made in RPG Maker MV originally as an homage to the simplicity of earlier Dragon Quest / Dragon Warrior games.
